name: R5-MedicationAdministration-R4-MedicationAdministration
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 MedicationAdministration into FHIR R4

element.display: Administration of medication to a patient

target.display: Administration of medication to a patient
target.comment: R5 `MedicationAdministration` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MedicationAdministration`

element.display: Plan this is fulfilled by this administration

target.comment: R5 `MedicationAdministration.category` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `MedicationAdministration.category` - category changed from array to scalar (max cardinality from * to 1); category changed the binding strength from Example to Preferred
R5 `MedicationAdministration.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MedicationAdministration.contained`

R5 `MedicationAdministration.device` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `MedicationAdministration.device` - device has change due to type change: R5 device CodeableReference has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 device

element.display: Details of how medication was taken

target.display: Details of how medication was taken
target.comment: R5 `MedicationAdministration.dosage` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MedicationAdministration.dosage`
R5 `MedicationAdministration.dosage.dose` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MedicationAdministration.dosage.dose`

R5 `MedicationAdministration.dosage.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `MedicationAdministration.dosage.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `MedicationAdministration.dosage.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MedicationAdministration.dosage.id`
R5 `MedicationAdministration.dosage.method` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MedicationAdministration.dosage.method`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `MedicationAdministration.dosage.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `MedicationAdministration.dosage.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Dose quantity per unit of time

target.display: Dose quantity per unit of time
target.comment: R5 `MedicationAdministration.dosage.rate[x]` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `MedicationAdministration.dosage.rate[x]` - rate[x] has change due to type change: R5 `rate[x]` `Ratio` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `rate[x]`
R5 `MedicationAdministration.dosage.route` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MedicationAdministration.dosage.route`
R5 `MedicationAdministration.dosage.site` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MedicationAdministration.dosage.site`

element.display: Free text dosage instructions e.g. SIG

target.display: Free text dosage instructions e.g. SIG
target.comment: R5 `MedicationAdministration.dosage.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MedicationAdministration.dosage.text`

element.display: A list of events of interest in the lifecycle

target.display: A list of events of interest in the lifecycle
target.comment: R5 `MedicationAdministration.eventHistory` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MedicationAdministration.eventHistory`

R5 `MedicationAdministration.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `MedicationAdministration.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `MedicationAdministration.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MedicationAdministration.id`
R5 `MedicationAdministration.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MedicationAdministration.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `MedicationAdministration.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MedicationAdministration.implicitRules`
R5 `MedicationAdministration.language` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `MedicationAdministration.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred
R5 `MedicationAdministration.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MedicationAdministration.meta`

R5 `MedicationAdministration.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `MedicationAdministration.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

R5 `MedicationAdministration.note` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `MedicationAdministration.note` - note has change due to type change: R5 `note` `Annotation` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `note`

element.display: Specific date/time or interval of time during which the administration took place (or did not take place)

target.comment: R5 `MedicationAdministration.partOf` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `MedicationAdministration.partOf` - partOf has change due to type change: R5 `partOf` `Reference` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `partOf`

element.display: Who or what performed the medication administration and what type of performance they did

target.display: Who performed the medication administration and what they did
target.comment: R5 `MedicationAdministration.performer` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MedicationAdministration.performer`

element.display: Who or what performed the medication administration

target.comment: R5 `MedicationAdministration.performer.actor` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `MedicationAdministration.performer.actor` - actor has change due to type change: R5 actor CodeableReference has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 actor

R5 `MedicationAdministration.performer.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `MedicationAdministration.performer.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `MedicationAdministration.performer.function` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MedicationAdministration.performer.function`
R5 `MedicationAdministration.performer.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MedicationAdministration.performer.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `MedicationAdministration.performer.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `MedicationAdministration.performer.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Concept, condition or observation that supports why the medication was administered
When the MedicationAdministration was first captured in the subject's record

target.comment: R5 `MedicationAdministration.request` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MedicationAdministration.request`

element.display: in-progress | not-done | on-hold | completed | entered-in-error | stopped | unknown

target.display: in-progress | not-done | on-hold | completed | entered-in-error | stopped | unknown
target.comment: R5 `MedicationAdministration.status` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MedicationAdministration.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/medication-admin-status|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/medication-admin-status|4.0.1 (Equivalent)
R5 `MedicationAdministration.statusReason` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MedicationAdministration.statusReason`
R5 `MedicationAdministration.subject` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MedicationAdministration.subject`

element.display: Reason full dose was not administered

target.comment: R5 `MedicationAdministration.supportingInformation` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MedicationAdministration.supportingInformation`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `MedicationAdministration.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MedicationAdministration.text`
